body_html:
I don't want to recover to a closed context, I want a new context to process tensoerflow operations. As I understand that Tensorflow uses more than one stream within the same context to accelerate data processing from host to device and vice-versa. Someone needs to set these up manually, it will be nice to be handled in one call.

Thanks anyway

body:
I don't want to recover to a closed context, I want a new context to process tensoerflow operations. As I understand that Tensorflow uses more than one stream within the same context to accelerate data processing from host to device and vice-versa. Someone needs to set these up manually, it will be nice to be handled in one call.
